skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.primitives.Unload
skill.description:
To unload a set of 'transportedEntities'.
Entities won't be unloaded if they are not beeing transported.

parameter.name: loadedEntities
parameter.description: The set of elements to unload.

parameter.name: destination
parameter.description: The destination where to unload the entities on.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" an element to unload.

link.name: unload
link.description: To enact the decision to "unload" an element.

feedback.name: unloaded
feedback.description: Sent each time an entity have been unloaded.

argument.name: transportableEntity
argument.description: The "transportable" entity that is beeing unloaded.

feedback.name: notUnloaded
feedback.description: Sent each time a "transportableEntity" cannot be unloaded.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "transportableEntities" have been visited.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "transportableEntities" is empty (no element to act on).
